title: Daughter of the Sword by Steve Bein (Fated Blades Book 1)

While she wants to track down a rumored cocaine shipment, he gives her the least promising case possible. But the caseÃ¢â‚¬â€the attempted theft of an old samurai swordÃ¢â‚¬â€proves more dangerous than anyone on the force could have imagined.

The owner of the sword, Professor Yasuo Yamada, says it was crafted by the legendary Master Inazuma, a sword smith whose blades are rumored to have magical qualities. Or so says Yamada, and though he has studied swords and swordsmanship all his life, Mariko isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t convinced.

But MarikoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s skepticism hardly matters. Her investigation has put her on a collision course with a curse centuries old and as bloodthirsty as ever.
